title: Does Howard Lutnick Know ‘the Truth’ About Tether?
description: Speaking at Davos, the Cantor Fitzgerald CEO says the stablecoin issuer has the money to back USDT. Maybe it’s time we all started to believe in Tether, despite the “truthers”?

title: Solana Meme Coin Dogwifhat Spikes 257% as SOL Reclaims $100
description: BONK isn’t the hottest Solana meme coin at the moment: WIF has more than doubled in price this week alone.

title: Why is Bitcoin price down today?
description:
Bitcoin price is down today as traders continue to realize profits as volatility spikes.

The bullish momentum that propelled Bitcoin (BTC) over $49,000 in 2024 seems to be waning, with BTC price hitting a year-to-date low on Jan. 15. 

The contraction in Bitcoin price comes as investors in the United States flock to institutional investment products after spot ETF approval.

Let’s take a closer look at the factors impacting Bitcoin price today.

Read more

title: Unstoppable Domains launches badge-gated group chat feature for username holders
description:
The Unstoppable Domains app now allows messaging within groups instead of just between individuals, and badges can be used to automate membership.

Web3 username protocol Unstoppable Domains (UD) launched a new group chat feature, according to a Jan. 17 announcement.

The feature allows username owners to form group chats that are badge-gated, meaning that only wallet accounts with particular characteristics are allowed to participate in the chat. The feature was created using Web3 communication system Push Protocol.

UD is a Web3 username protocol. It allows wallet holders to register human-readable names that can stand for a particular wallet account. The team claims this can potentially help to prevent other users from needing to cut and paste long strings of characters when interacting with an account. Web3 usernames are also sometimes called “Web3 domain names.”

Read more

title: Ethereum’s Dencun upgrade launches on Goerli testnet
description: Ethereum developers have successfully deployed the Dencun upgrade on the Goerli testnet, with mainnet activation in sight.

title: QCP: Ethereum likely to surpass Bitcoin in midterm
description: Ethereum is outperforming Bitcoin, driven by market anticipation of potential spot ETH ETF approvals.

title: Rocket Pool’s X account compromised
description: The X account of the Ethereum staking protocol Rocket Pool was hacked on Jan. 17, with the exploiter asking users to migrate their assets via a malicious link.
